dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 22 EH: Protecting America’s Strategic Petroleum Reserve from China Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To prohibit the Secretary of Energy from sending petroleum products from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve to China, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting America’s Strategic Petroleum Reserve from China Act.

section.header: Prohibition on sales of petroleum products from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve to China
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Secretary of Energy shall not draw down and sell petroleum products from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve—

paragraph.text: to any entity that is under the ownership, control, or influence of the Chinese Communist Party; or
except on the condition that such petroleum products will not be exported to the People’s Republic of China.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives January 12, 2023.
